comments:
Reopen a library, system throws exception.

Steps:
1.Open eclipse 3.1
2.Create a new workspace
3.Create a libary'
4.Close the eclipse, and reopen the eclipse and workspace

Expected Results:
1.Can be opened correctly.

Actual Results:
1.System throws exception(see the attachment, detail log can not be opened)

1.The first opened, system can throws exception as follows:
An unexpected internal exception occurred.Please see log for detail.
  Plug-in Provider:Eclipse.org
  Plug-in Name:BIRT Designer UI
  Plug-in ID:org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui
  Version:1.0.1
  Error Code:Error.GUIException.invokedByUnexpectedException
  Error Message:Resource is out of sync with the file system: /sdfsad/lib_122.rptlibrary.

then, system always pop up error message, but can not open the detail log

Notes: Eclipse 3.0, not Eclipse 3.1

All kinds of platforms exist the bug

User FileEditorInput to save the file to workspace. Previous implementation save the file to file system directly. That causes the file on file system is our of sync with the file manged by eclipse workspace.

traces.message: Resource is out of sync with the file system: /sdfsad/lib_122.rptlibrary.

causedBy.message: Resource is out of sync with the file system: /sdfsad/lib_122.rptlibrary.
